name: Parachute Dropper Man
description:
Made for the Brackeys game jam 2022.1: It is not real!

The game revolves around a man with a parachute who jumps down a deep dark pit in search of a diamond rumoured to be at the bottom. Will he make it? or succumb to the seemingly endless amounts of spike traps waiting for him throughout the pit!

Features:

  • Randomly generated obstacles on your way down the pit
  • Simplistic controls ( A and D or Left key or Right key for movement)
  • A man with a parachute
  • A diamond
